I just wanted to see some comments after mine and I will tell you one thing once you are bullied you're good time is over the only thing that can help you against people who bully you is brutal force and you can talk shit like "oooh it's your fault for being bullied" yeah because I live? The MC was bad person but some people doesn't have enough strength to bring themselves to live even if they are being shit on. This isn't place for bragging about life stuff but I was bullied almost my whole school life and somehow I ended up almost finishing University right now but there was a moment in my life I wanted to suicide I wanted to hang myself and some people just do it. I doubt anyone can understand how bullying works unless someone related to them will experience it so I will just say one thing with broad smile, I hope people close to you will experience bullying in your life and not just few pranks but serious like 8 years in 3 different schools bullying, enjoy :)
